com.artemis

Class BaseEntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.BaseEntitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelayedIteratingSystem, EntityLinkManager, EntitySystem, IntervalSystem, IteratingSystem

    public abstract class BaseEntitySystem
extends BaseSystem
implements EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener
    Tracks a subset of entities, but does not implement any sorting or iteration.
    Author:
    Arni Arent, Adrian Papari

      Constructor and Description
      BaseEntitySystem(Aspect.Builder aspect)

      Called if entity has come into scope for this system, e.g created or a component was added to it.

      • getEntityIds

        public IntBag getEntityIds()
        Gets the entities processed by this system. Do not delete entities from this bag - it is the live thing.
        Returns:
        System's entity ids, as matched by aspect.
